trans-unit.source: Application Gateway
trans-unit.target: Application Gateway

trans-unit.source: Application Gateway provides an Azure-managed HTTP load balancing solution based on layer 7 load balancing.
trans-unit.target: Application Gateway provides an Azure-managed HTTP load balancing solution based on layer 7 load balancing.

trans-unit.source: Application load balancing allows the use of routing rules for network traffic based on HTTP.
trans-unit.target: Application load balancing allows the use of routing rules for network traffic based on HTTP.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: backendAddressPools
trans-unit.target: backendAddressPools

trans-unit.source: The list of IP addresses of the back end servers.
trans-unit.target: The list of IP addresses of the back end servers.

trans-unit.source: The IP addresses listed should either belong to the virtual network subnet, or should be a public IP/VIP or private IP
trans-unit.target: The IP addresses listed should either belong to the virtual network subnet, or should be a public IP/VIP or private IP

trans-unit.source: backendHttpSettingsCollection
trans-unit.target: backendHttpSettingsCollection

trans-unit.source: Every pool has settings like port, protocol, and cookie based affinity.
trans-unit.target: Every pool has settings like port, protocol, and cookie based affinity.

trans-unit.source: These settings are tied to a pool and are applied to all servers within the pool
trans-unit.target: These settings are tied to a pool and are applied to all servers within the pool

trans-unit.source: frontendPorts
trans-unit.target: frontendPorts

trans-unit.source: This port is the public port opened on the application gateway.
trans-unit.target: This port is the public port opened on the application gateway.

trans-unit.source: Traffic hits this port, and then gets redirected to one of the back end servers
trans-unit.target: Traffic hits this port, and then gets redirected to one of the back end servers

trans-unit.source: httpListeners
trans-unit.target: httpListeners

trans-unit.source: Listener has a frontend port, a protocol (Http or Https, these are case-sensitive), and the SSL certificate name (if configuring SSL offload)
trans-unit.target: Listener has a frontend port, a protocol (Http or Https, these are case-sensitive), and the SSL certificate name (if configuring SSL offload)

trans-unit.source: requestRoutingRules
trans-unit.target: requestRoutingRules

trans-unit.source: The rule binds the listener and the back end server pool and defines which back end server pool the traffic should be directed.
trans-unit.target: The rule binds the listener and the back end server pool and defines which back end server pool the traffic should be directed.

trans-unit.source: Currently works only as Round-robin
trans-unit.target: Currently works only as Round-robin

trans-unit.target: Example of an application gateway Json template:

trans-unit.source: Additional resources
trans-unit.target: Additional resources

trans-unit.source: Read [ application gateway REST API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/mt299388.aspx) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Read [ application gateway REST API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/mt299388.aspx) for more information.
